li.a: Generated Summary: id: BetsySmithMDSEatingAdmission01; Eating - functional ability during 3 day assessment period; effective: Jan 19, 2020, 12:00:00 AM; Setup or clean-up assistance - Helper sets up or cleans up; patient completes activity. Helper assists only prior to or following the activity.

Generated Summary: id: BetsySmithMDSOralHygieneAdmission01; Oral hygiene - functional ability during 3 day assessment; effective: Jan 19, 2020, 12:00:00 AM; Supervision or touching assistance - Helper provides verbal cues or touching/steadying assistance as patient completes activity. Assistance may be provided throughout the activity or intermittently.
